com.nexmo.client

Interface NexmoMediaEventListener


  • public interface NexmoMediaEventListener
    NexmoMediaEventListener dispatches a NexmoMediaEvent related to a NexmoConversation.

    Available events on a NexmoMediaEventListener are:

    • onMediaEnabled(NexmoMediaEvent)
    • onMediaDisabled(NexmoMediaEvent)

    Example usage:

         nexmoClient.newConversation(CONVERSATION_NAME, CONVERSATION_DISPLAY_NAME, new NexmoRequestListener<NexmoConversation>() {
         @Override
         public void onSuccess(NexmoConversation conversation) {
              // Update the application UI here if needed.
          conversation.addMediaEventListener(new NexmoMediaEventListener(){
         @Override
               void onMediaEnabled(NexmoMediaEvent event){
                  Log.d("NexmoMediaEventListener:onMediaEnabled", "Got [" + event.getMediaType() + "] from:" + event.getMember().getId());

               }
         @Override
               void onMediaDisabled(NexmoMediaEvent event){
                  Log.d("NexmoMediaEventListener:onMediaDisabled", "Got [" + event.getMediaType() + "] from:" + event.getMember().getId());

               }
          });
         }
         @Override
         public void onError(NexmoAPIError error) {
              // Update the application UI here if needed.
         }
    });
